text: Despite some of the mercenaries withdrawing due to injuries, the drone siege had been successfully overcome, and the trucks had safely made it out of Tokyo Kingdom.
After driving for a bit, we slowly came to a stop in a deserted parking lot.

name: Sakura
text: This is...?

name: Me
text: Looks like we've arrived at the destination.

name: Faust
text: Good-work. This-is-a-safe-zone, you-may-relax. Your-mission-ends-here.

name: Sakura
text: Yaaay! Mission accomplished!

name: Me
text: Yeah.
Upon hearing those words the mercenaries all loosened up, and they began congratulating each other, making plans to get drinks, and whatnot.

name: Faust
text: Do-not-disband-yet.

name: Sakura
text: ...Pfft... pffhaha...

name: Me
text: Sakura? What's so funny?
Sakura covered her mouth for some reason and was trying her best not to laugh.

name: Sakura
text: It's because, that woman, she's putting on an act! She can speak completely normal, but she does that mechanical voice! Pffheh.
While Sakura was trying her best not to laugh, I stared at the research facility that seemed to be our destination.

name: Me
text: (If I remember correctly... then this is...)

name: Sakura
text: Don't you find it funny?! It's just a character she made up!!

name: Me
text: No, I was just thinking, "I knew it."
By, "I knew it," I was referring to our destination. As well as the uneasiness regarding the job itself that I had constantly felt.
One might think that this research facility, which had been our destination, would be a business rumored to have connections to Nomad...
...but no, it definitely wasn't.
I didn't know what might be going on behind the scenes, but at the very least I couldn't imagine a company manufacturing baby diapers would be interested in our "cargo."

name: Me
text: (Of course there might be a huge underground organization behind the scenes, using this company as a front, but... probably not.)

name: Me
text: It's just a hunch, but what if the actual destination of the "cargo" wasn't here...?

name: Me
text: Or ratherーtransporting this "cargo" wasn't even the mission in the first place?

name: Sakura
text: Ehh, Fuma-kun, do you mean that...

name: Faust
text: What-are-you-two-whispering-about?

name: Sakura
text: Wh-Whoa! Faust-san!

name: Sakura
text: Really... There's no need to keep up the act at this point! It's just bleugh!!!
Perhaps she was trying to mess with her, but Sakura kept hitting Faust on the shoulder. Just watching her made me nervous.

name: Me
text: N-No, we were just talking about how if the mission is over we can finally receive our payment!

name: Sakura
text: Yeah, yeah, our payment!! And also about where we'll go for our luxury dinner.

name: Faust
text: Your payment, hmm. You're right. I have to pay you...

name: Me
text: Ooh!? You spoke normally!?

name: Sakura
text: That's what I just told you!
The other mercenaries also gathered around when they heard mention of the word "payment."

name: Mercenaries
text: Oh, payment!

name: Mercenaries
text: This is what I've been waiting for!

name: Faust
text: Don't be in such a rush... No need to worry, I will properly pay you.

name: Faust
text: Starting with you.
A wad of cash was... not what was shown in my direction. It was actually the muzzle of a large custom handgun.

name: Sakura
text: Wait a sec!? What do you think you're doing all of a sudden!?

name: Mercenary
text: Hey, hey! What's going on!?

name: Mercenary
text: What's the matter, did the kids do something?

name: Faust's Subordinate
text: Freeze, mercenaries!!
By the time we noticed, Faust's subordinates were pointing guns at the mercenaries from behind.

name: Faust
text: Orders from our client. Apparently they don't want people to know where this "cargo" is going.

name: Me
text: So you're shutting us up...
The mercenaries were seething with anger at the sudden turn of events, but were unable to move with Faust's subordinates pointing their guns at them.

name: Me
text: (So she's not going to allow even a single one of the mercenaries she scrounged up to go home alive... shit!)

name: Faust
text: I will pay you as promised. It will look as if you got blinded by the money and had a falling out with each other.

name: Me
text: I see, it's true that if that happened, no one would be surprised that it was this bunch.
I looked around at the faces of the mercenaries.

name: Faust
text: Farewell, little boy.
Faust's black finger reached for the trigger of her giant handgun.

name: Sakura
text: Fuma-kun!!
Sakura tried to jump forward to protect me. But before she couldー
*BANG!!!!*

name: Faust
text: ーUgh!?
Faust's body was shaken by the impact and she cried out in pain.

name: Sakura
text: Eh!? What!?

name: Faust
text: I got... shot? Who the hell did that...?

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Gyahahaha!! Close call, bro!

name: Sakura
text: You!?
The good-natured Orc mercenary who had complimented Sakura appeared from behind a bush with his gun still aimed at Faust.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: I was listening from the shadows over there, and that's a nasty little story, huh?

name: Faust
text: Hngh... ggh, you dare to ambush me...

name: Orc Mercenary
text: I've been a mercenary for years, but this is my first time seeing a situation as awful as this.

name: Sakura
text: But why!? When did you hide!?

name: Orc Mercenary
text: I heard everything from him over there. How a lot of things were "strange" and how it might be a good idea not to trust our client.

name: Sakura
text: From Fuma-kun? What do you mean "strange?"

name: Me
text: When we were attacked by those drones earlier, I managed to look at the "cargo"...
Inside the cargo had been bare, unarmored machine parts, most likely the core of a drone or something like that.
The fact that the UFS attacked us during transport suggested that those parts had been stolen from the UFS and were probably a military secret that was still under development.
And our destination had been the research facility of a company making baby products, which most likely had nothing to do with secret military research...

name: Me
text: That's when I had gotten a bad feeling. So, I had those guys over there break away for a moment.

name: Sakura
text: Is that what you meant when you said you're "withdrawing because you were injured"!?

name: Orc Mercenary
text: We were pursuing you on our own after that, but it looks like his hunch was spot on!

name: Me
text: Thanks for your help. I was on the verge of getting killed.

name: Sakura
text: Fuma-kun, you planned all of this behind the scenes!? Why didn't you tell me?!

name: Me
text: I mean, Sakura, If had I told you, your behavior would've given it away immediately.

name: Sakura
text: Hmph... I can't really deny that...

name: Faust
text: Tsk... Who knew a kid like you found his way into the mercenaries.

name: Me
text: Sorry things didn't go the way you wanted. I'm not such an idiot that I'll be meekly disposed of.

name: Faust
text: Interesting. Little boy... no, tell me your name.

name: Me
text: Fuma.

name: Faust
text: Fuma, huh. I commend you. But now you die!
And as soon as Faust shouted, a hidden blade flew out of her body.

name: Sakura
text: Whoa!? Just how many weapons does this woman carry!?

name: Faust
text: Dodged it, hmm. Well whatever, it's all the same if I slaughter you all!
The women who were apparently Faust's subordinates again readied their guns.

name: Sakura
text: This looks like I have to get a bit serious.

name: Me
text: Yeah, let's go, without letting our guard down!
